entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023
